pr_title: Ignore registry port when inferring auth from maven settings

timeline.bodyText: It'd be nice if this server == null code could go into getServerFromMavenSettings
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText:
Could you elaborate? I can't see an option right now to implement that: There could, or could not be, a server returned.
If I switch this to use Optional, I would have to swap this out with an isPresent check instead to continue with the decryption below...
replies.author: padyx

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. I think we can leave this null check here.
replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText: You don't need this null check. We check nullability with NullAway, and unless the argument is marked with @Nullable, it is never null.
timeline.author: chanseokoh
chanseokoh

timeline.message:
Ignore port as fallback when inferring registry auth from maven settings

Fixes #2135

timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Never mind. I just did it myself.
replies.author: chanseokoh
